mapper.select: SELECT T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S_DETAILADDRESS FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = T.W_NO ORDER BY T.T_IDX DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S_DETAILADDRESS FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = T.W_NO ORDER BY T.T_IDX DESC )A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TESTING (T_IDX, T_TITLE, T_CONT, W_NO, T_DATE, T_COST, S_NO) SELECT (NVL(MAX(T.T_IDX), 0) + 1), #{t_title}, #{t_cont}, #{w_no}, #{t_date}, #{t_cost}, #{s_no} FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON T.W_NO = W.W_NO
mapper.select: SELECT T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S.S_DETAILADDRESS, W.W_NAME, W.W_KIND, W.W_VINTAGE, W.W_LOCATION FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON T.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE T.T_IDX = #{t_idx}

SELECT J.U_NO, T.T_COST, T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S.S_DETAILADDRESS FROM TESTINGJOIN J LEFT JOIN TESTING T ON J.T_IDX = T.T_IDX LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON T.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE J.U_NO = #{u_no} ORDER BY T.T_IDX DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT U_NO) FROM TESTINGJOIN WHERE T_IDX = #{t_idx}
SELECT DISTINCT U.U_NAME, U.U_PHONE FROM TESTINGJOIN TJ JOIN TUSER U ON TJ.U_NO = U.U_NO WHERE TJ.T_IDX = #{t_idx}
